event1.name: Galactic Gambit
event1.description:
It is a technical event where 
teams participate in two rounds: The first round mirrors the mechanics of Among Us, while the second round involves solving a crossword puzzle. The team with the highest cumulative score across both rounds will be declared as the winner.


Rules:
1. Each team should consist of two members
2. ⁠The teams will navigate through two rounds of challenges
3. ⁠Tasks will be divided into technical and non-technical
4. ⁠Judging will be based on points awarded for completing tasks
5. ⁠Any malpractice will result in disqualification
6. ⁠Remaing rules will be told on the day of the event

Note: This event is exclusively for participants from Easwari Engineering College only.

Registration Fees: 
For Non Members-  Rs. 120/- per team
For Members- Rs. 90/- per team 
 
Event Coordinators: 
Anchita N    - 9940697090 
Kanishka C - 9342045281

event2.name: Watt Wizardry
event2.description:
Watt Wizardry will be a team-based competition, with each team consisting of three individuals. Teams solve clues, complete tasks, and move forward to the next stage by solving these. The finale round includes multiple-choice questions. Are you ready for the ultimate challenge?
 
Rules:
    1. Each team will consist of 3 members.
2. Teams will receive clues and riddles, which will lead them towards the goal.
3. In order to fetch the next clue, the team must solve the clue in their hands.
4. The award goes to the team that performs the best.
5. Further instructions will be given on the day of the event.

Note: It is an Intra college event.

Registration Fees: 
For Non Members-  Rs.90 /- per team
For Members- Rs.70 /- per team 
Each team consists of three people.

Event Coordinators: 
Emadh Ahamed S :  8056984515
Suchitra M               :  8637632684

event3.name: Slytherin's Curse
event3.description:
Four teams will play the game at the same time. One teammate will stand on the board, while the other will be given a set of technical questions. The player on the board moves in accordance with the weightage of the right answer provided by the other player. The first team to reach the goal will be declared as the winner, while the second team will be declared as the runner. The goal is to get into the goal position

Rules:
1. Each team consists of two members.
2. One player will be standing on the board other player will be provided with a set of technical questions.
3. Player will move according to the weightage of the questions answered correctly.
4. Two lifelines will be provided, from those any one can be used.
5. The first team reaching the goal is declared the winner.
6. Additional instructions provided on spot.

Note: It is an Intra college event.

Registration Fees: 
For Non Members-  Rs. 80/- per team
For Members- Rs. 60/- per team 
Each team consists two people.

        
Event Coordinators: 
Janani R                 : 9791312476 
Anirudh Kumar S : 8610157273

event4.name: Genesis
event4.description:
It is a technical event which provides
participants a platform to showcase their innovative ideas across various domains. It's an unique opportunity to engage with fellow enthusiasts, expand your network, and explore
the forefront of innovation.

Theme- Any Technical Topic


RULES:

1. Team size: 1-3
2. The PPT slides must range from 10-12 slides.
3. The team will get 5-6 minutes for a presentation followed by a questionaire which
lasts for 2 minutes.
4. Plagiarism will result in immediate disqualification.
5. Judge's decision is final.
6. Submission details will be provided after registration.

SUBMISSION DEADLINE: 19/03/2024


EVENT COORDINATORS:
Varsheni.P : 9962135691
Jayashree.M: 9600143420

event5.name: Ideathon
event5.description: Today's wastage is tomorrow's shortage. The Energy Club brings to you the anthemic Sherlock Ωhms as a part of its sensational flagship event Technotsav 2023. Let’s watch who can decipher the clues before the time runs out. Experience the electrifying treasure hunt with your crime partners.

event6.name: Workshop
event6.description: This cybersecurity workshop will be conducted by Red Team Hacker. Explore the nuances of cyber defense through engaging sessions, practical exercises, and expert-led demonstrations covering topics such as threat intelligence, penetration testing, and incident response. Regardless of your level of experience, this event offers invaluable insights to elevate your cybersecurity knowledge.
